indications:
Indications relief of
discomfort in mild urinary-tract infections; alkalinisation of urine
name: SODIUM BICARBONATE - ALKALINISATION OF URINE
cautions: Cautions cardiac disease; patients on sodium-restricted diet; elderly; avoid prolonged use; interactions: Appendix 1 (antacids)
side-effects: Side-effects eructation, alkalosis on prolonged use
doses:
3 g in water every 2 hours until urinary pH exceeds 7;
maintenance of alkaline urine 5–10 g daily
